cn.trinea.android.common.util
类 HttpUtils

java.lang.Object
  cn.trinea.android.common.util.HttpUtils

public class HttpUtils
extends java.lang.Object

HttpUtils

    Http get, you can also use HttpCache
  • httpGet(HttpRequest) http get synchronous
  • httpGet(String) http get synchronous
  • httpGetString(String) http get synchronous, response is String
  • httpGet(HttpRequest, HttpListener) http get asynchronous
  • httpGet(String, HttpListener) http get asynchronous
    Http post
  • httpPost(HttpRequest)
  • httpPost(String)
  • httpPostString(String)
  • httpPostString(String, Map)
    Http params
  • getUrlWithParas(String, Map)
  • getUrlWithValueEncodeParas(String, Map)
  • joinParas(Map)
  • joinParasWithEncodedValue(Map)
  • appendParaToUrl(String, String, String)
  • parseGmtTime(String)

httpGet

public static HttpResponse httpGet(HttpRequest request)
http get synchronous
  • use gzip compression default
  • use bufferedReader to improve the reading speed

参数：
request -
返回：
the response of the url, if null represents http error

httpGet

public static void httpGet(java.lang.String url,
                           HttpUtils.HttpListener listener)
http get asynchronous
  • It gets data from network asynchronous.
  • If you want get data synchronous, use httpGet(HttpRequest) or httpGetString(HttpRequest)

参数：
url -
listener - listener which can do something before or after HttpGet. this can be null if you not want to do something

httpGet

public static void httpGet(HttpRequest request,
                           HttpUtils.HttpListener listener)
http get asynchronous
  • It gets data or network asynchronous.
  • If you want get data synchronous, use HttpCache.httpGet(HttpRequest) or HttpCache.httpGetString(HttpRequest)

参数：
request -
listener - listener which can do something before or after HttpGet. this can be null if you not want to do something

httpPostString

public static java.lang.String httpPostString(java.lang.String httpUrl,
                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parasMap)
http post

参数：
httpUrl -
parasMap - paras map, key is para name, value is para value. will be transfrom to String by joinParas(Map)
返回：
the content of the url, if null represents http error
另请参见：
httpPost(HttpRequest)

getUrlWithParas

public static java.lang.String getUrlWithParas(java.lang.String url,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parasMap)
join url and paras 
 getUrlWithParas(null, {(a, b)})                        =   "?a=b";
 getUrlWithParas("baidu.com", {})                       =   "baidu.com";
 getUrlWithParas("baidu.com", {(a, b), (i, j)})         =   "baidu.com?a=b&i=j";
 getUrlWithParas("baidu.com", {(a, b), (i, j), (c, d)}) =   "baidu.com?a=b&i=j&c=d";

参数：
url - url
parasMap - paras map, key is para name, value is para value
返回：
if url is null, process it as empty string

getUrlWithValueEncodeParas

public static java.lang.String getUrlWithValueEncodeParas(java.lang.String url,
                                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parasMap)
join url and encoded paras

参数：
url -
parasMap -
返回：
另请参见：
getUrlWithParas(String, Map), StringUtils.utf8Encode(String)

joinParas

public static java.lang.String joinParas(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parasMap)
join paras

参数：
parasMap - paras map, key is para name, value is para value
返回：
join key and value with EQUAL_SIGN, join keys with PARAMETERS_SEPARATOR

parseGmtTime

public static long parseGmtTime(java.lang.String gmtTime)
parse gmt time to long

参数：
gmtTime - likes Thu, 11 Apr 2013 10:20:30 GMT
返回：
-1 represents exception otherwise time in milliseconds
